name: the shrine the monk and the minotaur
name_original: the shrine the monk and the minotaur
description:
the shrine the monk and the minotaur 

by why make games 

for ld 45

make sure you keep your sound on

character sprites by dan patrick leal

additional art by ashley tobin

programming and programmer art by josh evensen

music and sound by josh evensen

idea discussion by dan giacobbe joseph evensen ashley tobin dan patrick leal josh evensen

thanks for playing

keyboard controls

left / right - move space - jump left ctrl - attack up - interact

joystick probably works too!
